languages.text: "Леди-Навигатор, сколь неожиданная и приятная встреча, учитывая обстоятельства". {n}Ханн учтиво склоняет голову перед Кассией.{/n} "Не имею чести знать вас лично, однако герб Дома Орселлио мне, без сомнения, знаком. Как поживает почтенный регент?"

traits.locale_text: "Леди-Навигатор, сколь неожиданная и приятная встреча, учитывая обстоятельства". {n}Ханн учтиво склоняет голову перед Кассией.{/n} "Не имею чести знать вас лично, однако герб дома Орселлио мне, без сомнения, знаком. Как поживает почтенный регент?"

languages.text: "Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honour of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honourable regent?"
languages.original_text: "Леди-Навигатор, сколь неожиданная и приятная встреча, учитывая обстоятельства". {n}Ханн учтиво склоняет голову перед Кассией.{/n} "Не имею чести знать вас лично, однако герб Дома Орселлио мне, без сомнения, знаком. Как поживает почтенный регент?"

traits.locale_text: "Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honor of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honorable regent?"

"Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honor of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honorable regent?"

"Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honor of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honorable regent?"

"Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honour of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honourable regent?"

languages.text: 「レディ・ナヴィゲイター、このような状況でお会いできるとは予想もしておりませんでしたが、光栄です」{n}ハンはおごそかにカシアに頭を下げた。{/n}「個人的にお会いしたことはございませんが、オーセリオ家の紋章はもちろん存じ上げております。名誉ある摂政殿はお元気でいらっしゃいますか？」
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honour of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honourable regent?"

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・ナヴィゲイター、このような状況でお会いできるとは予想もしておりませんでしたが、光栄です」{n}ハンはおごそかにカシアに頭を下げた。{/n}「個人的にお会いしたことはございませんが、オーセリオ家の紋章はもちろん存じ上げております。知っていますよ。摂政のご様子はいかがですか？」

languages.text: “考虑到当下的情况，这可真是场意想不到的愉快会面，导航者女士。”{n}汉恩彬彬有礼地向卡西娅低下头。{/n}“我还没有幸和您见过面，但我认得奥赛罗家族的纹章。尊敬的摄政王贵体是否安康？”
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honour of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honourable regent?"

traits.locale_text: “考虑到当下的情况，这可真是场意想不到的愉快会面，导航者女士。”{n}汉恩彬彬有礼地向卡西娅低下头。{/n}“我还没有幸和您见过面，但我认得奥塞罗家族的纹章。尊敬的摄政王贵体是否安康？”

languages.text: «Lady Navegante, es un encuentro tan agradable como sorprendente dadas las circunstancias». {n}Hann inclina respetuosamente la cabeza ante Cassia.{/n} «Aunque no tengo el honor de conocerla personalmente, sí reconozco el emblema de la casa Orsellio. ¿Cómo se encuentra el honorable regente?».
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honour of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honourable regent?"

traits.locale_text: «Lady Navegante, es un encuentro tan agradable como sorprendente dadas las circunstancias». {n}Hann inclina respetuosamente la cabeza ante Cassia.{/n} «Aunque no tengo el honor de conocerla personalmente, sí reconozco el emblema de la casa Orsellio. ¿Cómo se encuentra el honorable regente?».

languages.text: « Dame navigatrice, quelle surprise ! C'est un plaisir de vous rencontrer, en dépit des circonstances. » {n}Hann incline respectueusement la tête devant Cassia.{/n} « Je n'avais jusqu'à maintenant pas eu l'honneur de faire votre connaissance, mais il va sans dire que l'emblème de la maison Orsellio ne m'est pas inconnu. Comment l'honorable régent se porte-t-il ? »
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honour of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honourable regent?"

traits.locale_text: « Dame navigatrice, quelle surprise ! C'est un plaisir de vous rencontrer, en dépit des circonstances. » {n}Hann incline respectueusement la tête devant Cassia.{/n} « Je n'avais jusqu'à maintenant pas eu l'honneur de faire votre connaissance, mais il va sans dire que l'emblème de la maison Orsellio ne m'est pas inconnu. Comment l'honorable régent se porte-t-il ? »

languages.text: "Lady Navigator, was für ein unerwartetes und angenehmes Zusammentreffen, in Anbetracht der Umstände." {n}Hann senkt regelkonform den Kopf vor Cassia.{/n} "Ich hatte noch nicht die Ehre, Euch persönlich kennenzulernen, kenne aber natürlich das Emblem des Hauses Orsellio. Wie geht es dem ehrenwerten Regenten?"
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honour of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honourable regent?"

traits.locale_text: "Lady Navigator, was für ein unerwartetes und angenehmes Zusammentreffen, in Anbetracht der Umstände." {n}Hann senkt regelkonform den Kopf vor Cassia.{/n} "Ich hatte noch nicht die Ehre, Euch persönlich kennenzulernen, kenne aber natürlich das Emblem des Hauses Orsellio. Wie geht es dem ehrenwerten Regenten?"

languages.text: "Leydi Rotacı, içinde bulunduğumuz durum göz önüne alındığında ne kadar da beklenmedik ve hoş bir sürpriz." {n}Hann, Cassia'nın karşısında münasip bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sizinle bizzat tanışma onuruna daha önce nail olamasam da Orsellio Hanesi'nin amblemine elbette aşinayım. Değerli naibiniz nasıllar?"
languages.original_text: "Lady Navigator, what an unexpected and pleasant meeting, considering the circumstances." {n}Hann decorously dips his head to Cassia.{/n} "I have not had the honour of being personally acquainted with you, but of course I know the emblem of House Orsellio. How fares the honourable regent?"

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Rotacı, içinde bulunduğumuz durum göz önüne alındığında ne kadar da beklenmedik ve hoş bir sürpriz." {n}Hann, Cassia'nın karşısında münasip bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sizinle bizzat tanışma onuruna daha önce nail olamamıştım ancak elbette ki Orsellio Hanesi'nin amblemine âşinayım. Değerli naibiniz nasıllar?"
